relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE for 3rd consecutive year
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report for its Ability to Execute and Completeness of Vision. Cloudflare is one of only nine vendors recognized in the report.

We believe this recognition reflects our continued commitment to provide one security platform that scales seamlessly from network to cloud, protecting all users and data across applications and AI. Cloudflare's security platform leverages an intelligent and programmable global cloud network to unify a range of diverse technologies and harnesses AI-powered threat intelligence to deliver low-touch, high-efficacy protection to distributed organizations of all sizes.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Gartner, Magic Quadrant for Security Service Edge, Analyst(s): Charlie Winckless, Thomas Lintemuth, Dale Koeppen, Charanpal Bhogal, May 20, 2025
